channel.title: 411ASP.NET: What's New
channel.description: A basic feed that parses http://www.411asp.net/func/new
channel.generator: WEB2RSS engine 1.0 by Michal Blaha (RSS parts from Roy Osherove)

item.title: item 0
item.description: In this FAQ, SmartPanda proposes a solution to the problem of the user clicking twice on a form's send button and returning duplicated record entries in a database.

item.title: item 1
item.description: This simple FAQ answers the question "Is there anyway to temporary disable the validator BEFORE I press the reset button, and enabled it again AFTER I press the reset button? I can't reset when I press my reset button because of the validator."

item.title: item 2
item.description: Since there is no "reset" type in the button control, how to clear all textboxes inside a form? This article explores this question.

item.title: item 3
item.description: In a previous article we provided methods to manage your Active Directory, in this article we will provide a method to obtain the user's "Primary Group" as the standard AD property "MemberOf" does not return the "Primary Group".

item.title: item 4
item.description: Because ASP.NET can contain only ONE "run-at-server" form in a webpage, say that we have many forms need to submit, how can we do that? Read on for the answer...
